ComicInfo.Title: The Coming of... Stegron the Dinosaur Man!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Coming of... Stegron the Dinosaur Man!: Curt Connors asks Spider-man to go to the Savage Land and stop Dr. Stegron from using dinosaur extract to turn himself into a dinosaur.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:51:19. [Issue ID 27253]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
